short_summary: Psychometric Testing Tool for Defence Team Coaching Program Fleures ,
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Notice: Psychometric Testing Tool and Group Reports**

**Reference Number:** cb-5905-15101854
**Solicitation Number:** W7809A124004

**Notice:**
The Government of Canada is seeking a vendor to provide psychometric testing tools and group reports for the Defence Team Coaching Program (DTCP) within the Chief Professional Conduct and Culture (CPCC) of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Subject:**

* **Psychometric Testing Tools:**
	+ Enneagram IEQ9 tokens for individual tests
	+ Enneagram reports (400 individual reports)
* **Group Reports:**
	+ Team Enneagram reports (25 group reports)
* **Accreditation:**
	+ Enneagram accreditation for individuals (5)
	+ Enneagram accreditation for teams (5)

**Scope of Work:**

The contract is for an initial term of one (1) year, with three optional extensions for an additional year each.

**Requirements:**

* Provide high-quality psychometric testing tools and group reports for the DTCP
* Conduct individual and group tests
* Provide accreditation services for individuals and teams
* Maintain confidentiality and adhere to data protection regulations

**Deadline:**

Tenders are expected to be received no later than July 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Instructions:**

For more information, please visit: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/.../rfpw24004-eng_doc.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/.../rfpw24004-eng_doc.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/.../rfpw24004-fr_doc.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/.../rfpw24004-fr_doc.pdf) (French)

**Contact Information:**

* Viktoria Melnichuk
* Phone: (343) 542-1604
* Email: [viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca](mailto:viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: National Defence Headquarters, 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

All tenders must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buy and Sell website (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/) by the deadline indicated above. Only Canadian companies are eligible
